About Us

Home / About Us

Courtney McCarthy

Director & Registered Electrician

Courtney is the founder and director of Switchup Electrical, bringing years of hands-on experience and technical expertise to every project. Known for his professionalism, reliability, and friendly approach, Courtney has built a reputation for quality service and genuine care for his clients.

He started the business with a simple goal — to provide honest, dependable electrical work that people can trust. Over the years, Courtney has worked on a wide range of projects, from family homes to large-scale commercial sites, always maintaining the same commitment to excellence and safety.

Our Expertise

Switchup Electrical specialises in a wide range of services for homes and businesses across Auckland. Our team handles EV charger installations, smart home systems, pool and spa electrical, switchboard upgrades, lighting design, renovations, and commercial fit-outs. Every project is completed to New Zealand standards, with a focus on safety, reliability, and clear communication from start to finish.

Why Choose Us

We believe in honest advice, transparent pricing, and work that’s done right the first time. Our team shows up when we say we will, keeps your space tidy, and communicates clearly from start to finish. We stand by our workmanship and prioritise safety, so you can have confidence in every job—big or small. Choose Switchup Electrical for a straightforward, stress-free experience and results you can rely on.
